metadata.description: Comprehensive Clash Royale card database with elixir costs, rarities, and types

skeletons.name: Skeletons
skeletons.description: Three fast, very weak melee fighters. Skeletons are the only thing that spawns from the Tombstone!

ice_spirit.name: Ice Spirit
ice_spirit.description: Spawns one fast, weak ice spirit that freezes enemies.

fire_spirit.name: Fire Spirit
fire_spirit.description: Spawns one fast, weak fire spirit that deals area damage.

bats.name: Bats
bats.description: Three fast, very weak flying creatures. Bats are the only thing that spawns from the Tombstone!

goblins.name: Goblins
goblins.description: Three fast, very weak melee fighters. Goblins are the only thing that spawns from the Goblin Hut!

spear_goblins.name: Spear Goblins
spear_goblins.description: Three fast, very weak ranged fighters. Spear Goblins are the only thing that spawns from the Goblin Hut!

ice_golem.name: Ice Golem
ice_golem.description: A slow, weak tank that freezes enemies when destroyed.

guards.name: Guards
guards.description: Three fast, very weak melee fighters with shields.

archers.name: Archers
archers.description: A pair of lightly armored ranged attackers. They're really good at shooting things.

knight.name: Knight
knight.description: A tough melee fighter. The Barbarian's handsome, cultured cousin. Rumor has it that he was knighted based on the sheer awesomeness of his mustache alone.

bomber.name: Bomber
bomber.description: Small, lightly protected skeleton that throws bombs. Deals area damage that won't hurt him.

skeleton_army.name: Skeleton Army
skeleton_army.description: Spawns an army of skeletons. Meet Larry and his friends Harry, Gary, Jerry, Larry, Terry, Barry, Mary, and Carey.

minions.name: Minions
minions.description: Three fast, very weak flying creatures. Minions are the only thing that spawns from the Minion Horde!

musketeer.name: Musketeer
musketeer.description: Don't be fooled by her delicate appearance. She's a deadly ranged fighter.

giant_skeleton.name: Giant Skeleton
giant_skeleton.description: The bigger the skeleton, the bigger the bomb. Carries a bomb that blows up when the Giant Skeleton dies.

witch.name: Witch
witch.description: Summons skeletons to do her bidding, even after death! If you touch her, prepare for a fiery surprise.

baby_dragon.name: Baby Dragon
baby_dragon.description: Flying troop that deals splash damage. Baby Dragon hatchlings are adorable, but don't let that fool you - they're still dangerous!

prince.name: Prince
prince.description: Don't be fooled by his delicate appearance. He's a deadly melee fighter with a devastating charge attack.

wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.description: The most awesome man to ever set foot in the arena! The Wizard will throw fireballs, and he will throw them well.

mini_pekka.name: Mini P.E.K.K.A
mini_pekka.description: The Arena is a certified butterfly-free zone. It's also a certified Mini P.E.K.K.A-free zone.

valkyrie.name: Valkyrie
valkyrie.description: Tough melee fighter that deals splash damage. She's got a mean streak a mile wide.

hog_rider.name: Hog Rider
hog_rider.description: Fast melee troop that targets buildings. Can jump over the river to get to the other side.

goblin_barrel.name: Goblin Barrel
goblin_barrel.description: Spawns three Goblins anywhere in the Arena. It's going to be a magical experience!

skeleton_barrel.name: Skeleton Barrel
skeleton_barrel.description: Spawns a barrel of skeletons anywhere in the Arena. It's going to be a magical experience!

dart_goblin.name: Dart Goblin
dart_goblin.description: Fast, very weak ranged fighter. Dart Goblins are the only thing that spawns from the Goblin Hut!

goblin_gang.name: Goblin Gang
goblin_gang.description: Spawns three Goblins and two Spear Goblins. It's going to be a magical experience!

bandit.name: Bandit
bandit.description: Fast melee fighter that dashes to her target. She's got a mean streak a mile wide.

night_witch.name: Night Witch
night_witch.description: Summons skeletons to do her bidding, even after death! If you touch her, prepare for a fiery surprise.

mega_minion.name: Mega Minion
mega_minion.description: Flying troop that deals splash damage. Mega Minion hatchlings are adorable, but don't let that fool you - they're still dangerous!

inferno_dragon.name: Inferno Dragon
inferno_dragon.description: Flying troop that deals splash damage. Inferno Dragon hatchlings are adorable, but don't let that fool you - they're still dangerous!

lumberjack.name: Lumberjack
lumberjack.description: Fast melee fighter that deals splash damage. He's got a mean streak a mile wide.

battle_ram.name: Battle Ram
battle_ram.description: Fast melee troop that targets buildings. Can jump over the river to get to the other side.

zappies.name: Zappies
zappies.description: Three fast, very weak ranged fighters. Zappies are the only thing that spawns from the Goblin Hut!

flying_machine.name: Flying Machine
flying_machine.description: Flying troop that deals splash damage. Flying Machine hatchlings are adorable, but don't let that fool you - they're still dangerous!

magic_archer.name: Magic Archer
magic_archer.description: Don't be fooled by his delicate appearance. He's a deadly ranged fighter.

royal_recruits.name: Royal Recruits
royal_recruits.description: A pair of lightly armored ranged attackers. They're really good at shooting things.

rascals.name: Rascals
rascals.description: Three fast, very weak melee fighters. Rascals are the only thing that spawns from the Goblin Hut!

mega_knight.name: Mega Knight
mega_knight.description: The bigger the skeleton, the bigger the bomb. Carries a bomb that blows up when the Mega Knight dies.

electro_dragon.name: Electro Dragon
electro_dragon.description: Flying troop that deals splash damage. Electro Dragon hatchlings are adorable, but don't let that fool you - they're still dangerous!

elixir_golem.name: Elixir Golem
elixir_golem.description: A slow, weak tank that freezes enemies when destroyed.

heal_spirit.name: Heal Spirit
heal_spirit.description: Spawns one fast, weak heal spirit that heals allies.

skeleton_dragons.name: Skeleton Dragons
skeleton_dragons.description: Flying troop that deals splash damage. Skeleton Dragon hatchlings are adorable, but don't let that fool you - they're still dangerous!

mother_witch.name: Mother Witch
mother_witch.description: Summons skeletons to do her bidding, even after death! If you touch her, prepare for a fiery surprise.

electro_spirit.name: Electro Spirit
electro_spirit.description: Spawns one fast, weak electro spirit that stuns enemies.

firecracker.name: Firecracker
firecracker.description: Fast, very weak ranged fighter. Firecrackers are the only thing that spawns from the Goblin Hut!

skeleton_king.name: Skeleton King
skeleton_king.description: The bigger the skeleton, the bigger the bomb. Carries a bomb that blows up when the Skeleton King dies.

archer_queen.name: Archer Queen
archer_queen.description: Don't be fooled by her delicate appearance. She's a deadly ranged fighter.

golden_knight.name: Golden Knight
golden_knight.description: Fast melee fighter that deals splash damage. He's got a mean streak a mile wide.

monk.name: Monk
monk.description: Fast melee fighter that deals splash damage. He's got a mean streak a mile wide.

phoenix.name: Phoenix
phoenix.description: Flying troop that deals splash damage. Phoenix hatchlings are adorable, but don't let that fool you - they're still dangerous!

little_prince.name: Little Prince
little_prince.description: Don't be fooled by his delicate appearance. He's a deadly ranged fighter.

giant.name: Giant
giant.description: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. A real one-man wrecking crew!

dragon.name: Dragon
dragon.description: Flying troop that deals splash damage. Dragon hatchlings are adorable, but don't let that fool you - they're still dangerous!
